Name: The Porterhouse Bar

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Good for sport. Good for a hearty irish breakfast. Good for pints of beer and nice selection. Lots of room (especially important when there for sport). Friendly staff. Definitely a great staple.

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: I also have been inside, but in addition I ordered something from the menu. Not the Portersteak because that's not there...(why?)  Instead I ordered thesirloin steak, a cheeseburger and a Shepard's Pie. One advice: don't go here for the ‚Ä¶

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Fine recently opened (sports)bar for a drink and some food. It has a pool table and tv screens to watch sport events.  Spareribs were good and quite tasty. Looming forward to see how it develops as it's still quite new. Due to the somewhat odd layout it can be sometimes hard to get the staffs attention. Will go here again tho!

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text:
Great sport bar-restaurant! it's on an excellent location in Oostpoort.
Awesome food and amazing staff, all really friendly.

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text:
Fantastic little bar in the outskirts of Amsterdam city centre.

Good beer selection with craft Beers on the menu. Irish Feeling inside but also ‚Ä¶

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text:
The worst meal I had during my stay in Amsterdam. The burger I ordered was overcooked and dry. The fries which came with it were mediocre at best.
During our meal I heard at least two waiters telling guests "I just work here" ‚Ä¶

Name: The Porterhouse Bar

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: The salmon steak was cooked to perfection and the other meals were well presented and tasted quite good. There seems to be 3 separate sections of this restaurant,the front, back, and inside. This might have been the cause of the delay in us ‚Ä¶

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Friendly staff, very nice interior. The fish and chips was very tasty

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Food was good, and portions were big (we had the ribs and the shepherd's pie). Servers were excellent. It's a sports bar and TVs were on showing a soccer match we didn't have any interest in, but due to the somewhat odd layout, there are a some quiet spots without TVs on sight.

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Great Irish style pub, great value for food, pool table, large selection of drinks. We had the fish and chips and the chicken burger which was great, the staff were so friendly and accommodating especially alyssa who served us most of the night, we will for sure be back!

Name: The Porterhouse Bar

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Good choice of hamburger or grilled chicken or even ribs. Good choice if beers. Waiters are very helpful. I was alone and decided to watch the NFL match on the big TV. Prices on the average.

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text:

My kids love the pancakes and to play on the pool table.
It's a good place to be really in the morning or  late in the evening

Name: The Porterhouse Bar

Review Text: Nice place. good staff. Good food. Pool table! Beer menu might be a bit more interesting, but of course that is a personal thing.

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Had a very nice dinner, with some good (even vegetarian) burgers and great fish and chips. Felt like being in a nice pub.

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: The same lackluster service as one would usually expect to receive in a bar in the city center. Staff seem uninterested, and don't seem to know what's on their menu or what they have on tap.

Name: The Porterhouse Bar
Review Text: Nice but cant order salad until midday. The chef would not accommodate the request 20 mins before. Food nice tho.
